title: Finally, Taylor Fritz Forces His Way Into the Top 10
description: Fritz’s breakthrough in the ATP rankings is the latest sign of a resurgence for American men’s tennis, though these are not yet the good old days. Not even close.
dc:creator: Christopher Clarey
media:description: Taylor Fritz is the first American man in the top 10 since John Isner in June 2019 and the first American man to make his top-10 debut since Jack Sock in November 2017.
